obj.title: Personal Portfolio
obj.description: Developed a personal portfolio website using React, JavaScript, and CSS, showcasing projects, skills, and experiences.

obj.title: Talk to Database
obj.description: AI application that connects to your SQL database. Instead of running queries, you can simply ask the AI chatbot to find data for you.

obj.title: Personal Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) Assistant
obj.description: Large Langugae Based (LLM) RAG assistant that retrieves information from a database and generates a response based on the user's query.

obj.title: Zillow Data Pipeline
obj.description: End-to-end data pipeline that extracts housing data from Zillow Rapid API Hub (JSON format), transforms it, and performs analytics using Airflow and AWS Services

obj.title: Restaurant Business Analysis
obj.description: Analyzed business data of a local pizza restaurant using SQL & Power BI to identify key performance metrics and provide recommendations for improvement.

obj.title: UW-Go : Stress-free bus riding experience
obj.description: UW-Go is a mobile user-experience that reminds users of their destination stop and provides a stress-free bus riding experience.

obj.title: InstaCart Product Strategy (2024-2027)
obj.description: Developed a 3-year product strategy for InstaCart, focusing on improving the user experience, increasing customer retention, and expanding the customer base.

obj.title: Zillow-Relocate
obj.description: Zillow Relocate connects users with professional movers, simplifying the moving process with tailored recommendations and booking options

obj.title: Towards a Portable Platform Integrated With Multispectral Noncontact Probes for Delineating Normal and Breast Cancer Tissue Based on Near-Infrared Spectroscopy
obj.description: A portable cancer detection platform that can differentiate breast cancer tissues.
